Content: Good app but need few improvements. music stops after playing for some time also continuously plays music even earphone is removed while listening. crashes if internet connection is not available. there should be buttons to start n stop music in app.
The app crashes alot. Its already been like 4 days and now the app doesn't even opens. Still giving it a 3 star since the experience was good. Please do something about it.

Installed it a couple of days back and opened it right after. Worked great and loved it. But couldnt open the app anymore..keeps crashing...uninstalled it, restsrted my phone and installed it again. Now it wont even finish installing, i get an error message. Pitty
it keeps on crashing I haven't use your app not even a single time. you need to do more work in that app so that is easy to use
